testcase.name: Successfully checking out an item by searching a brand name and clicking its logo

Kemangi 145' in the 'Detail Alamat' field..........passed And the user clicks the 'Simpan' button.....................................passed And the user clicks the 'Pilih Pengiriman' button...........................passed And the user clicks the 'JNE REG' option....................................passed And the user clicks the 'Pilih Pembayaran' button...........................passed And the user clicks the 'Transfer Bank' button..............................passed And the user clicks the 'Transfer Bank Mandiri' option......................passed And the user clicks the 'Konfirmasi' button on Payment Method...............passed And the user clicks the 'Bayar Sekarang' button.............................passed And the user clicks the 'Cek Pesanan Saya' button...........................passed Then the user compares the total payment in the 'Thank You' page with the one in the 'Pesanan Saya' page.passed
